entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 19.
